sentences.sentence: The band have reportedly decided to split up.
sentences.translation: 据说这个乐队已经决定解散。

sentences.sentence: There was, reportedly, hand-to-hand combat in the streets.
sentences.translation: 据说街上发生了肉搏战。

sentences.sentence: The mine reportedly had an accident rate treble the national average.
sentences.translation: 据报道，那个矿的事故发生率是全国平均水平的三倍。
